apollo.details:
Apollo Tyrannos
Type: Drifter Battleship
Base Build Time: 6h
Required Skill: Advanced Shipbuilding III

Materials:
- Tritanium: 10000000
- Pyerite: 5000000
- Mexallon: 800000
- Isogen: 500000
- Nocxium: 45000
- Zydrine: 15000
- Megacyte: 8500
- Drifter Neural Cortex: 45
- Drifter Hyper-Processing Unit: 45
- Advanced Quantum Core: 25
- Auto-Integrity Preservation Seal: 280
- Core Temperature Regulator: 2
- Life Support Backup Unit: 140

Drifter ships require special materials obtained from Drifter encounters.
